newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: NORIT ACQUIRES 49 PCT MEXICAN CARBON FIRM.
newsitem.headline: NORIT ACQUIRES 49 PCT MEXICAN CARBON FIRM.

text.p: Dutch carbon maker Norit said on Friday that it's American unit Norit Americas Inc had acquired a 49 percent stake in Mexican carbon maker NAI.
NAI has an annual turnover of about 20 million guilders.
The deal will have a slightly positive effect on 1997 results, Norit said.
